definition: to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

sentences.english: How have the machines become so adept?
sentences.chinese: 机器翻译怎么变得这么好了？

sentences.english: In the research of machine translation, the example-based machine translation is a good method.
sentences.chinese: 在机器翻译的研究中，基于实例是一种很好的方法。

sentences.english: A new method of polysemant meaning disambiguation is provided.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种机器翻译中多义词词义排歧的新方法。

sentences.english: Many think a big part of the solution will be machine translation.
sentences.chinese: 许多人认为机器翻译将成为解决问题的主要答案。

sentences.english: As TED translates hundreds of talks, they’re creating “parallel corpora”, the raw material for machine translation systems.
sentences.chinese: 平行的语料库，这是机器翻译系统的原始资料。

sentences.english: At the outset, let me confess that machine translation usually sucks.
sentences.chinese: 首先，我坦白的说机器翻译通常很糟糕。

sentences.english: An assignment that includes unacknowledged machine-translated sections is academic dishonesty.
sentences.chinese: 一份作业中部分为机器翻译也属于学术欺骗。

sentences.english: We point out that the research trend in MT is mixing experience - based methods with rule - based and statistics - based methods .
sentences.chinese: 指出以“混合”为特点是机器翻译研究的新趋势。

sentences.english: You can improve the machine translations by editing the translation in place.
sentences.chinese: 您可以在适当的地方修改译文来改善机器翻译。

pinyin: zi4 ran2 yu3 yan2 chu3 li3
